SummaryEnglish: Yujiro has worked hard and diligently practiced for the eventuality to be a kabuki star and rule the art form. Nevertheless, he is passed over and not given the chance he expected. Aizo wants to put his voice to use, but is unsuccessful. They come across each other at an audition and have a tiff. This leads to their big break and also their potential downfall.
Aliases: 映画『この世界の楽しみ方〜Secret Story Film〜
